title: I attempted Arcade Leona for Skintober
body:
https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/0800043a7d8d93ca3637e50e08583a245a13a54ccdaaf2e0b7d7f003ec1165bc.jpg

Skintober List for anyone who doesn't know
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DJ9Il08UEAAT7cE.jpg

replies.body: Cute! I love the idea of the gameboy shield :D
Its not a gameboy its a Rito Brand Game Dude :^)
Original GB could take an arrow to the knee and the arrow would have to get a desk job, and it would only tell you the story after a couple bourbons at the tavern.

That hairstyle would work really well as a Star Guardian Leona. 

Also love the keyblade idea.

Hmm I was unaware of this. I could have made 31 Morgana skin ideas. :( 

But lazy, and no more artistic skill.
You can still do it. You can either do the ones you missed or just skip them and do the rest.

Her calf and feet should be bigger. And usually sleeves don't defy gravity, so i would suggest you have them dangle from her arms kind of.

Anyways cool job!
I just a beginning artists so I learning things, ty for feedback
Your welcome! To improve its super important to practice often.
